trans-unit.source: Represents the control that redistributes space between columns or rows of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representerer kontrollen som redistribuerer avstanden mellom kolonner eller rader med et <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The GridSplitter control redistributes space between rows or columns in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>, without changing the dimensions of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen GridSplitter redistribuerer mellomrom mellom rader eller kolonner i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>uten endring av dimensjoner av <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>

trans-unit.source: For example, when a GridSplitter resizes two columns, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> property of one column is increased while at the same time the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> property of the other column is decreased by the same amount.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel når en GridSplitter endrer størrelse på to kolonner i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>-egenskapen til én kolonne økes om gangen i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>-egenskapen til den andre kolonnen er redusert med samme beløp.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows how to define a horizontal or vertical GridSplitter by setting the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties and by leaving the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> properties set to their default values.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser hvordan du definere et vannrett eller loddrett GridSplitter ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>Egenskaper og ved å la den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>satt til standardverdiene.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: **How to create vertical and horizontal GridSplitter controls** |GridSplitter type|<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> value|<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> value| |-----------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |Resizes rows|<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>|<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| |Resizes columns|<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>|<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| |If <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> is greater than or equal to <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>, this resizes the columns.
trans-unit.target: **Slik oppretter du loddrette og vannrette GridSplitter Kontroller** | GridSplitter typen | verdien for <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>| verdien for <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>| |-----------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | Endrer størrelse rader | <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>| <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| | Endrer størrelsen på kolonnene | <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>|<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| | Hvis <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A>er større enn eller lik <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>, du endrer størrelsen på kolonnene.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> is less than <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>, this resizes the rows.|<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>|<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| A GridSplitter can overlap a row or column that contains other content, or it can occupy a row or column by itself.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A>er mindre enn <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>, endrer størrelsen på radene. | <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>| <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| En GridSplitter kan overlapper rader og kolonner som har innhold som andre, eller den kan ha en rad- eller alene.</xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to define a GridSplitter, see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du definerer en GridSplitter [slik: endre størrelse på rader med et GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [slik: endre størrelse på kolonner med en GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> property settings do not achieve the desired GridSplitter behavior, you can change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> property settings.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>egenskapsinnstillingene ikke for GridSplitter ønsket virkemåte, kan du endre den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>egenskapsinnstillingene.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: A GridSplitter may be obscured by other objects that are contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.
trans-unit.target: En GridSplitter kan være skjult av andre objekter som finnes i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A>samlingen av <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information about how to prevent this situation, see [How to: Make Sure That a GridSplitter Is Visible](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du kan forhindre at dette, kan du se [slik: Sørg for at en GridSplitter er Visible](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Avhengighet egenskapene for denne kontrollen, kan angis ved kontrollens standardstilen.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en egenskap er satt av en standardstilen, kan endre egenskapen standardverdi når kontrollen vises i applikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: Standardstilen er avhengig av hvilken stasjonær tema brukes når programmet kjører.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [standard WPF oppsett](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum distance that a user must drag a mouse to resize rows or columns with a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir minimumsavstand som en bruker må dra musen for å endre størrelse på rader eller kolonner med en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The minimum distance that is defined by DragIncrement is reinitialized continually as the user drags the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Minimumsavstand som er definert av DragIncrement initialiseres kontinuerlig som brukeren drar musen.

trans-unit.source: For example, when you drag the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> by the DragIncrement amount, the rows or columns are resized.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel når du drar du <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>datamengden DragIncrement rader eller kolonner skaleres.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: To resize the rows and columns more, you must drag the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> the same amount.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil endre størrelsen på radene og kolonner flere, må du dra den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>samme beløp.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, changes to column and row sizes that are made by using the mouse or the keyboard to move the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> are made in multiples of the DragIncrement.
trans-unit.target: Derfor endringer i kolonne- og størrelser som er gjort ved hjelp av musen eller tastaturet til å flytte den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>utføres i multiplum av DragIncrement.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: A value that represents the minimum distance that a user must use the mouse to drag a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> to resize rows or columns.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som representerer minimumsavstand som en bruker må bruke musen dra en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> endre størrelse på rader eller kolonner.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: Standard er 1.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance that each press of an arrow key moves a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir avstanden hvert trykk på en pil flytter en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: The distance that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> moves for each press of an arrow key.
trans-unit.target: Avstanden som den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> flytter for hvert trykk på en pil.

trans-unit.source: The default is 10.
trans-unit.target: Standard er 10.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.KeyboardIncrement*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.KeyboardIncrement*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.KeyboardIncrement*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Creates the implementation of <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter implementeringen av <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> for den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridSplitterAutomationPeer"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En ny <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridSplitterAutomationPeer"> </xref> for denne <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Called when a key is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når en tast.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control loses keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> kontrollen mister tastaturfokus.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Responds to a change in the dimensions of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Svarer på endringer i størrelsen på den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control determines what type of pointer to display after its <xref:System.Windows.Size> is set.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>kontrollen bestemmer hvilken type pekeren skal vises etter den <xref:System.Windows.Size>er angitt.</xref:System.Windows.Size> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: Information about the change in size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Informasjon om endringen i størrelsen på den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style that customizes the appearance, effects, or other style characteristics for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control preview indicator that is displayed when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir stilen som tilpasser utseendet, effekter eller andre stilen for den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> kontrollen forhåndsvisning indikatoren som vises når det <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*>er satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*>

trans-unit.source: When you set styles, there are some restrictions.
trans-unit.target: Når du har angitt stiler, er det noen begrensninger.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Styling and Templating](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [stil og Templating](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values `ResourceExtension` One of the following: `StaticResource` or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: ## XAML Attributtbruk ``` ``` ## XAML verdier `ResourceExtension` ett av følgende: `StaticResource` eller `DynamicResource`.

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Se [XAML ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: `StyleResourceKey` The key that identifies the style being requested.
trans-unit.target: `StyleResourceKey`Nøkkelen som identifiserer stilen som kreves.

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen refererer til en eksisterende ressurs i <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Egenskapen element syntaksen er teknisk mulig, men anbefales ikke.

trans-unit.source: See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Se [innebygde stiler og maler](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A binding reference using or <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> is also possible, but uncommon.
trans-unit.target: En binding referanse ved hjelp av eller <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>er også mulig, men uvanlig.</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| A preview of changes to row or column boundaries is displayed while the user drags the control, and the property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen | En forhåndsvisning av endringer i rad- eller grensene vises under bruker drags den kontrollen, og er satt til `true`.

trans-unit.source: The column and row boundaries are set when the user releases the mouse button.
trans-unit.target: Kolonne- og grensene angis når brukeren slipper museknappen.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref> for the preview indicator that shows the potential change in <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"></xref> dimensions as you move the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer den <xref href="System.Windows.Style"> </xref> for forhåndsvisning indikatoren som viser kan endre i <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"> </xref> dimensions når du flytter den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is the style that the current theme supplies.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er stilen som gjeldende tema leverer.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifikatoren for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle%2A>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which columns or rows are resized relative to the column or row for which the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control is defined.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hvilke kolonner eller rader skaleres i forhold til kolonnen eller raden som den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> kontrollen er definert.

trans-unit.source: To specify a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> that resizes rows or columns, set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Angi en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>som endrer størrelse rader eller kolonner, angi den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: If you cannot achieve the desired behavior by setting the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties, change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> or ResizeBehavior default values.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke kan oppnå ønsket virkemåte ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>Egenskaper, endre den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>eller ResizeBehavior standardverdier.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [slik: endre størrelse på rader med et GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [slik: endre størrelse på kolonner med en GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that indicates which columns or rows are resized by this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En av verdiene for enumeration som angir hvilke kolonner eller rader skaleres av dette <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeBehavior"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeBehavior"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifikatoren for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control resizes rows or columns.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> kontrollen endrer størrelse rader eller kolonner.

trans-unit.source: To specify a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> that resizes rows or columns, set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Angi en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>som endrer størrelse rader eller kolonner, angi den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: If you cannot achieve the desired behavior by setting the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties, change the ResizeDirection or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> default values.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke kan oppnå ønsket virkemåte ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>Egenskaper, endre ResizeDirection eller <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>standardverdier.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [slik: endre størrelse på rader med et GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [slik: endre størrelse på kolonner med en GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies whether to resize rows or columns.
trans-unit.target: En av verdiene for enumeration som angir om du vil endre størrelse på rader eller kolonner.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeDirection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeDirection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control updates the column or row size as the user drags the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> kontrollen oppdateringer kolonne- eller radstørrelsen som brukeren drar kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> requires an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object to be present in its parent tree in order to display drag preview feedback.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>krever en <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator>-objektet til å være til stede i det overordnede treet for å vise dra forhåndsvisning tilbakemelding.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: This requirement is typically met by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object that is available in the default style for the <xref:System.Windows.Window> or in the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object that is created by a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> object.
trans-unit.target: Dette kravet oppfylles vanligvis av den <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator>objektet som er tilgjengelig i standardmalen for den <xref:System.Windows.Window>eller i det <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator>objektet som er opprettet av en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> </xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator>

trans-unit.source: However, if neither of these is available, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control must define its own <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object.
trans-unit.target: Men hvis ingen av disse er tilgjengelig, den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>kontrollen må definere sitt eget <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| When the ShowsPreview property is set to `true`, a preview of the change in the row or column sizes is shown.
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen | Når egenskapen ShowsPreview er satt til `true`, vises en forhåndsvisning av endringen i rad- eller størrelser.

trans-unit.source: The actual size changes when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> is released.
trans-unit.target: Den faktiske størrelsen endres når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>er utgitt.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: If the property is set to `false`, the column or row sizes are updated in real time as the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen er satt til `false`, kolonne- eller størrelser er oppdatert i sanntid som bruker drags den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: If the keyboard is used to move the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control, column or row sizes are updated in real time even if the ShowsPreview property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis tastaturet brukes til å flytte den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>kontrollen, kolonne- eller størrelser oppdateres i sanntid selv om ShowsPreview-egenskapen er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> preview is displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> Forhåndsvisning er viste; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.
